body:
## Expected Behavior

A dynamic workflow that throws `ApplicationFailure.newNonRetryableFailure` should fail immediately.

## Actual Behavior

The workflow does not fail and eventually times out.

## Steps to Reproduce the Problem

See above!

## Specifications

  - Version: 1.0.9
  - Platform:
title: DynamicWorkflow does not handle ApplicationFailure.newNonRetryableFailure correclty
